name: Umber Hulk
description: A big buglike human shaped monster.

actions.name: multiattack
actions.description: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

actions.name: claw
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +8 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: mandibles
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +8 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.
